author: dkulp
msg: No point defining jaxb-api on Java6 and Java7 as you'll always just get
the version provided by the JDK anyway.

author: dkulp
msg: Speed up the build very slightly by not using regexes and antrun to create
the camel.osgi.version.clean property in every module.  (bundle plugin
can create it)  Only create the camel.schema.version property in the one

author: tjungblut
msg: [HAMA-556]: Graph package to support stopping the interations when the node changes are within the tolerance value as in the case of page rank

author: sebawagner
msg: Fixes wrong start/end date/time in iCal invitation part as time zone info was missing in DTSTART/DTEND
